goal.en: Build a solid foundation for quantum mechanics
goal.ch: Build a solid foundation for quantum mechanics

content.en:
"課程概述：Depict the concepts of quantum theory
課程目標：Build a solid foundation for quantum mechanics
Kets, Bras, operators and eigenvalue problem
-Absolute size and the superposition principle
-Kets and Bras
-Linear operators
-Eigenvalues and iegenvectors
Momentum of a free particle And wave packets
-Momentum states of a free particle
-Normalization of momentum eigenfunctions
-Wave packets
-Wave packet motion and group velocities
Communtators,And uncertainty principle
-Commutators and simultaneous eigenfunctions
-Expectation values and averages
-The uncertainty principle
Schrodinger equation
-Schrondinger equation
-Equation of motion of the expectation value
-The free particle energy eigenvalue problem
-Particle in a box energy eigenvalue problem
Harmonic oscillator
-Quantum harmonic oscillator in schrodinger representation
-Quantum harmonic oscillator in Dirac representation
-Time-dependent harmonic oscillator wave packet"
